description: Founders of Gundry + Ducker will be taking We Design Homes on a tour of their most exciting projects, whilst discussing how they form a close collaboration with their clients and use colour and materiality to create truly thoughtful homes.

factsheet.heading: Thoughtful homes series
paragraphs: As part of this year’s festival, We Design Homes invites you to join us in a series of online talks with some of the UK’s leading design-led architects, as they take us through a journey of recent projects whilst discussing what it takes to create some of London's most exceptionally thoughtful homes.

factsheet.heading: Gundry + Ducker
paragraphs: Gundry & Ducker are London-based architects and interior designers with extensive experience in the design of people’s homes. They offer a highly bespoke service that stems from individual discussion with clients, leading to the creation of beautifully unique spaces packed with character. Founders Tyeth Gundry and Christian Ducker will be taking us on a virtual tour of their most exciting London projects, whilst discussing how they form a close collaboration with their clients and use colour and materiality to create truly thoughtful homes.

images.title: Bay Window House designed by Gundry + Ducker

name: Creating thoughtful homes with Gundry + Ducker
